name: The Ruins
description: You've found yourself stuck in a maze riddled with traps and humanoid creatures that lurk in the dark. On your journey through the maze you will have to avoid the traps and navigate through the pitch black to the door at the end of the maze. The door won’t open unless you offer it a worthy sacrifice you will find within the maze. The Ruins is a horror game with parkour at times. More levels will be added in the near future and any suggestions for the game are welcomed!
